welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Fernando, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

restaurants.name: El Garaje
restaurants.description: El Garaje is a snack place located in San Fernando.
restaurants.address: Del Monumento de la Virgen 2 cuadras al Norte media cuadra al Oeste, San Fernando, Nueva Segovia

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Bob Hope Airport serves smaller regional airlines and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves Southwest Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves United Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights and some domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4

terminals.name: Terminal 6

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves United Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 8

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
